column4: How do I tell the Update Manager to ignore some updates?  I've chosen not to install a couple (e.g. some related to Braille for the blind), but each time I launch the Update Manager it offers them again.
why would you want that?  anything wrong w/ the updated version?
it's not that there's something wrong with having Braille capability, but I just don't need it.
well, good idea, except I've already uninstalled Gwibber for instance, and yet the Update Manager keeps throwing Gwibber updates at me.
stupid GUI tools, tend not to work as expected (w/ one notable exception on another distro)
